title: Pete Buttigieg
added: In June 2021, the White House created a task force to address supply chain disruptions, with Buttigieg as one of its leaders.<ref>{{cite news |last1=Shepardson |first1=David |title=U.S. officials look to address transportation supply chain issues |url=https://www.reuters.com/business/us-officials-look-address-transportation-supply-chain-issues-2021-07-16/ |access-date=October 27, 2021 |work=[[Reuters]] |date=July 17, 2021}}</ref>
